content.text: The video starts with a person holding a smartphone and showing a picture of a room with a table, a chair, and a potted plant. The table has a glass and a skull-shaped object on it. The room has a checkered floor and a window with a curtain. The person then shows a picture of a building with a tower and a statue on top. The building has a clock tower and a tower with a statue of a person on top. The building is surrounded by trees and has a fence around it. The person then shows a picture of a man sitting in front of a desk with two monitors, a keyboard, and a mouse. He is holding a bottle and a pen in his hands. He is looking at the monitor on the right. The desk has a keyboard, a mouse, and a bottle. Behind him is a chair. The room is illuminated by a neon light.
